00031 using namespace Hypertable;

00033 namespace {
00034   const int BUFFER_SIZE = 32768;
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 const char *CommandCopyFromLocal::ms_usage[] = {
00039   "copyFromLocal <src> <dst>",
00040   "",
00041   "  This program copies the local file <src> to the remote",
00042   "  file <dst> in the DFS.",
00043   (const char *)0
00044 };
00045 
00046 
00047 int CommandCopyFromLocal::run() {
00048   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00049   int32_t fd = 0;
00050   int error = Error::OK;
00051   EventPtr eventPtr;
00052   FILE *fp = 0;
00053   size_t nread;
00054   int srcArg = 0;
00055   uint8_t *buf;
00056   StaticBuffer send_buf;
00057 
00058   if (m_args.size() != 2) {
00059     cerr << "Wrong number of arguments.  Type 'help' for usage." << endl;
00060     return -1;
00061   }
00062 
00063   if ((fp = fopen(m_args[srcArg].first.c_str(), "r")) == 0) {
00064     perror(m_args[srcArg].first.c_str());
00065     goto abort;
00066   }
00067 
00068   try {
00069   fd = m_client->create(m_args[srcArg+1].first, true, -1, -1, -1);
00070 
00071   // send 3 appends
00072   for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00073     buf = new uint8_t [ BUFFER_SIZE ];
00074     if ((nread = fread(buf, 1, BUFFER_SIZE, fp)) == 0)
00075       goto done;
00076     send_buf.set(buf, nread, true);
00077     m_client->append(fd, send_buf, 0, &syncHandler);
00078   }
00079 
00080   while (true) {
00081 
00082     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00083       HT_ERRORF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00084       goto abort;
00085     }
00086 
00087     buf = new uint8_t [ BUFFER_SIZE ];
00088     if ((nread = fread(buf, 1, BUFFER_SIZE, fp)) == 0)
00089       break;
00090     send_buf.set(buf, nread, true);
00091     m_client->append(fd, send_buf, 0, &syncHandler);
00092   }
00093 
00094 done:
00095   m_client->close(fd);
00096     
00097   }
00098   catch (Exception &e) {
00099     HT_ERRORF("%s", e.what());
00100   }
00101 
00102 abort:
00103   if (fp)
00104     fclose(fp);
00105   if (error != 0)
00106     cerr << Error::get_text(error) << endl;
00107   return error;
00108 }
